04 July 2016

Overview

CCI (Previous Close: 100.33 | ATR: 1.26)

Bias: Short

Why: Keeping this on scan for now. Still think it needs to pull back before going too much higher. Big upward move without much consolidationâ€¦

Trade Plan: Ideally failed 102 push and then lower highs. Will only trade this on pullback with set risk and lower highs.

Levels of Interest:

  • Resistance: $102

GRUB (Previous Close: 30.77 | ATR: 1.18)

Bias: Short

Why: Short biased on this one. Getting into overbought territory. Last two days green, but closed at bottom of range

Trade Plan: Ideally 31 push and fail, then confirmation. If push and fail will short with risk at this level.

Levels of Interest:

  • Resistance: $31
  • Support: $29

LL (Previous Close: 15.88 | ATR: 0.75)

Bias: Short

Why: Looks overbought and has failed 16 numerous times. May breakthrough, but I expect a little pullback first

Trade Plan: Ideally 16 push and fail, then confirmation of downard trend.

Levels of Interest:

  • Resistance: $16

PAYX (Previous Close: 15.88 | ATR: 0.75)

Bias: Short

Why: Huge upward movement without consolidation. Potential for pullback as it travels towards 60 magnet.

Trade Plan: Ideally 60 push and fail, then confirmation of downard trend.

Levels of Interest:

  • Resistance: $60
